K

King - Class in com.chess.piece
King class is a child class of the Piece class It deals with the construction and the movement of the King piece on the board and other specific methods needed for the King piece The methods found here are: calculateLegalMove(), movePiece(), isColA(), isColH(), isCastled(), and toString()
King(int, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.King
 
King(int, Color, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.King
 
KING - com.chess.piece.Piece.PieceType
 
KingSideCastleMove(Board, Piece, int, Rook, int, int) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.KingSideCastleMove
 
kingSideCastleTest() - Method in class com.tests.chess.board.CastlingTest
Test the kingSideCastleMove for both the black and white kings
Knight - Class in com.chess.piece
Knight class is a child class of the Piece class It deals with the construction and movement of the Knight piece on the board and other specific methods needed for the Knight piece The methods found here are: calculateLegalMove(), movePiece(), isColA(), isColH(), isColB(), isColG(), and toString()
Knight(int, Color) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Knight
 
Knight(int, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Knight
